name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: Tomorrow President Trump will pardon a turkey at the White House. Then he’ll spend the next week criticizing it for not thanking him enough.

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: It came out that national security adviser H.R. McMaster called President Trump an idiot, and said he had the intelligence of a kindergartner. And Trump said, “Oh, yeah? Then why am I reading at a first grade level? And tweeting at a sixth grade level!”

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: This weekend Trump sent a tweet where he criticized Senator Jeff Flake for saying bad things about, quote, “your favorite president.” People were like, “He said bad things about Obama?”

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: Al Franken said that he isn’t resigning, but will spend the next few days reflecting. Reflecting is a political term meaning “hope someone else gets busted and this whole thing blows over.”

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: Last night Charles Manson died at the age of 83. Which means today he met his new roommates, Adolf, Osama, and the Time Warner customer service reps.
